title: America, HELP IS NOT ON THE WAY 4.21.22
itunes:title: America, HELP IS NOT ON THE WAY 4.21.22
description:
In episode 1231, Jack and Miles are joined by journalist and host of Authentic: The Story of Tablo, Dexter Thomas Jr. to discuss… Student Loans: Progressives want forgiveness, moderates FUCK NO, Tucker Carlson’s Russian puppet act is too much for…Newsmax?! And more!

  1. Student Loans: Progressives want forgiveness, moderates FUCK NO
  2. Biden’s Only Good Pre-Midterm Play: Cancel Student Debt

LISTEN: Riesling Pour Robert by Jahari Massamba Unit

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
